title: Facebook could face billions in potential damages as court rules facial recognition lawsuit can proce
text: Facebook is facing exposure to billions of dollars in potential damages as a federal appeals court on Thursday rejected Facebook’s arguments to halt a class action lawsuit claiming it illegally collected and stored the biometric data of millions of users. The class action lawsuit has been working its way through the courts since 2015, when […]

title: Facebook reportedly in talks with news publishers to offer 'millions' for content
text: The Wall Street Journal reported that the tech company was offering news executives as much as $3m a year to license stories

title: Facebook Said to Be in Talks with Publishers on News Effort
text: The social network is pitching an initiative to license articles from some of the largest American news publishers for its mobile app, according to people with knowledge of the discussions.

title: Facebook confirms news tab will launch this fall
text: Facebook on Thursday confirmed that it is working on a news tab feature to deliver topical stories to users that will launch this fall.

title: The Wall Street Journal: Facebook offering millions of dollars to news outlets to license articles
text: Facebook Inc. is offering news outlets millions of dollars for the rights to put their content in a news section that the company hopes to launch later this year, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Facebook loses facial recognition technology appeal, must face class action
text: A federal appeals court on Thursday rejected Facebook Inc’s (FB.O) effort to undo a class action lawsuit claiming that it illegally collected and stored biometric data for millions of users without their consent.

title: Ripple CEO voices concern about Facebook cryptocurrency Libra
text: Facebook (FB) will face challenges launching its new cryptocurrency project because it “let the public down,” according to a top crypto CEO.

title: Facebook is testing a way for you to subscribe to streaming video services
text: Facebook is testing sales of video-on-demand subscriptions for users in the U.S.

title: Facebook: Strong Growth Continues, but Questions Remain
text: Facebook (FB) on July 24 reported financial results for its second quarter of fiscal 2019.
